sentences.english: This is an action movie. It was all about fighting and killing.
sentences.chinese: 這是一部動作片，是關於打打殺殺的。

sentences.english: Fighting is not my style. I'm a well-educated man.
sentences.chinese: 打打殺殺你找別人吧，我是受過高等教育的。

sentences.english: I'm a combat soldier. That's all these jokers understand.
sentences.chinese: 我只知道打打殺殺，那些小丑只會這麼想。

sentences.english: It was all about fight and kill.
sentences.chinese: 這部影片都是關於打打殺殺的。
